text: eṭṭu iṇakaḷe (avan sr̥ṣṭiccirikkunnu.) cem'mariyāṭil ninn raṇṭuṁ, kēālāṭil ninn raṇṭuṁ. paṟayuka: (ava raṇṭileyuṁ) āṇvargaṅṅaḷeyāṇēā, atalla, peṇvargaṅṅaḷeyāṇēā, atumalla peṇvargaṅṅaḷuṭe garbhāśayaṅṅaḷ uḷkeāṇṭatineyāṇēā allāhu niṣid'dhamākkiyiṭṭuḷḷat‌? aṟivinṟe aṭisthānattil niṅṅaḷ enikk paṟaññutarū; niṅṅaḷ satyavānmārāṇeṅkil
